title.rendered: How Do I Get Rid Of My Old Car?

content.rendered:
Old cars, mainly if they are no longer running or no longer reliable, are difficult to sell as a private vehicle sale. Dealerships do not take these types of vehicles, and they often end up sitting in garages, driveways, or even backyards. Scrap yards or auto parts yards are the best place to sell Chicago junk cars, but there some issues to consider to make sure you are getting the best price.

Tips for Selling Chicago Junk Cars

To help you to sell your junk car, here are a few simple tips:

  • Make sure you have the title to the vehicle. Chicago junk cars must be sold with the title to verify ownership of the car.
  • Take everything out of the vehicle and double-check that you have not left any possessions in the vehicle, including the trunk.
  • You can remove stereos, batteries, or other accessories in the vehicle that are not considered as part of the junk price.
  • Call as soon as possible to schedule the pickup of your old junk car.

Why Aero Auto Parts Makes a Difference

Selling your old car to Aero Auto Parts makes for an easy process. We will arrive at your location, evaluate the car’s value, and provide you with a quote. We offer cash on the spot, and we even arrange for towing at no cost to the seller.

Call us anytime at 773-645-9586 to discuss selling your old car. We purchase non-running and running vehicles of all makes and models.
